news_header: Estonia addresses border crossing issues with Russia regarding the Narva River.
news_text: The Estonian Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a note to the Russian Embassy about border crossings from the Narva River. The note highlights that Russia has not agreed to conduct measurements of the river's border line, which is crucial for preventing navigation errors into Russian waters. In July, Estonia proposed jointly determining the river's border line with Russia to resolve differing interpretations of the waterway boundary.
